title: "Guntheri Christoph Schelhameri ... De motu Mercurii in tubo Torricilliano epistola accessit altera ejusdem argumenti Bernhardi Ramazzini ... itemque tertia, sive ejusdem Schelhameri ad objectiones Ramazzinianas responsio"
